name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: Why strange? I'd say the majority of scifi fans are liberal in thinking, but that's not universal. I know genre fiction authors who are staunchly conservative, and I'm also aware that there's a section of the fansbase who are liberal in everything else but get stuck in "rules and tradition" of a franchise.
